from AccessControl for role-based permissions and ERC2771Context for meta-transaction support. Works with ERC20Yield-compatible tokens to manage yield distributions. Uses timestamps for period calculations and maintains a history of distributions.","errors":{"AccessControlBadConfirmation()":[{"details":"The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"InvalidToken()":[{"details":"These errors provide more gas-efficient and descriptive error handling"}]},"events":{"Paused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`."},"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"},"Unpaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`."},"YieldClaimed(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256[],uint256)":{"params":{"fromPeriod":"The first period being claimed","holder":"The address claiming the yield","periodAmounts":"Array of amounts claimed for each period","toPeriod":"The last period being claimed","totalAmount":"The total amount of yield claimed","unclaimedYield":"Total amount of unclaimed yield after this claim"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"allPeriods()":{"returns":{"_0":"Array of timestamps when each period ends"}},"calculateAccruedYield()":{"returns":{"_0":"The total accrued yield amount"}},"calculateAccruedYield(address)":{"params":{"holder":"The address to calculate yield for"},"returns":{"_0":"The total accrued yield amount"}},"claimYield()":{"details":"Calculates and transfers all unclaimed yield for completed periods"},"constructor":{"params":{"endDate_":"The timestamp when the schedule ends","initialOwner":"The address that will receive admin rights","interval_":"The interval between distributions in seconds","rate_":"The yield rate in basis points (1 basis point = 0.01%, e.g., 500 = 5%)","startDate_":"The timestamp when the schedule starts","tokenAddress":"The address of the token this schedule is for"}},"currentPeriod()":{"returns":{"_0":"The current period number (0 if schedule hasn't started)"}},"endDate()":{"returns":{"_0":"The timestamp when the schedule ends"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"interval()":{"returns":{"_0":"The interval between distributions in seconds"}},"isTrustedForwarder(address)":{"details":"Indicates whether any particular address is the trusted forwarder."},"lastClaimedPeriod()":{"returns":{"_0":"The last period number claimed by the caller"}},"lastClaimedPeriod(address)":{"params":{"holder":"The address to check"},"returns":{"_0":"The last period number claimed by the holder"}},"lastCompletedPeriod()":{"returns":{"_0":"The last completed period number (0 if no periods completed)"}},"pause()":{"details":"Only callable by admin"},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"periodEnd(uint256)":{"params":{"period":"The period number (1-based)"},"returns":{"_0":"The timestamp when the period ends"}},"rate()":{"returns":{"_0":"The yield rate in basis points (1 basis point = 0.01%)"}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"startDate()":{"returns":{"_0":"The timestamp when the schedule starts"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"timeUntilNextPeriod()":{"returns":{"_0":"Time remaining in current period"}},"token()":{"returns":{"_0":"The ERC20 token address"}},"topUpUnderlyingAsset(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of underlying assets to add"}},"totalUnclaimedYield()":{"details":"This includes all completed periods that haven't been claimed yet","returns":{"_0":"The total amount of unclaimed yield"}},"totalYieldForNextPeriod()":{"details":"This is useful for ensuring sufficient funds are available for the next distribution","returns":{"_0":"The total amount of yield needed for the next period"}},"trustedForwarder()":{"details":"Returns the address of the trusted forwarder."},"underlyingAsset()":{"returns":{"_0":"The underlying asset token address"}},"unpause()":{"details":"Only callable by admin"},"withdrawAllUnderlyingAsset(address)":{"details":"Only callable by admin","params":{"to":"The address to send the underlying assets to"}},"withdrawUnderlyingAsset(address,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by admin","params":{"amount":"The amount of underlying assets to withdraw","to":"The address to send the underlying assets to"}}},"stateVariables":{"RATE_BASIS_POINTS":{"details":"Used to convert basis points to percentages (e.g., 500 basis points = 5%)"},"_endDate":{"details":"Must be after the start date"},"_interval":{"details":"Must be greater than 0"},"_lastClaimedPeriod":{"details":"Used to track which periods each holder has claimed"},"_periodEndTimestamps":{"details":"Calculated and stored at deployment for gas-efficient period lookups"},"_rate":{"details":"1 basis point = 0.01%, must be greater than 0"},"_startDate":{"details":"Must be in the future when the contract is deployed"},"_token":{"details":"Must implement the ERC20Yield interface"},"_totalClaimed":{"details":"Used to track total distributions and calculate remaining yield"},"_underlyingAsset":{"details":"Must be a valid ERC20 token contract"}},"title":"FixedYield - A contract for managing token yield distributions","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"InvalidToken()":[{"notice":"Custom errors for the FixedYield contract"}]},"events":{"UnderlyingAssetTopUp(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Event emitted when underlying assets are topped up"},"UnderlyingAssetWithdrawn(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Event emitted when underlying assets are withdrawn by admin"},"YieldClaimed(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256[],uint256)":{"notice":"Event emitted when yield is claimed"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"RATE_BASIS_POINTS()":{"notice":"The basis points denominator used for rate calculations (10,000 = 100%)"},"allPeriods()":{"notice":"Returns all period end timestamps for this yield schedule"},"calculateAccruedYield()":{"notice":"Calculates the total accrued yield for the caller including pro-rated current period"},"calculateAccruedYield(address)":{"notice":"Calculates the total accrued yield including pro-rated current period"},"claimYield()":{"notice":"Claims all available yield for the caller"},"constructor":{"notice":"Deploys a new FixedYield contract"},"currentPeriod()":{"notice":"Returns the current ongoing period number"},"endDate()":{"notice":"Returns the end date of the yield schedule"},"interval()":{"notice":"Returns the distribution interval"},"lastClaimedPeriod()":{"notice":"Returns the last claimed period for the caller"},"lastClaimedPeriod(address)":{"notice":"Returns the last claimed period for a holder"},"lastCompletedPeriod()":{"notice":"Returns the last completed period number that can be claimed"},"pause()":{"notice":"Pauses the contract"},"periodEnd(uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the period end timestamp for a specific period"},"rate()":{"notice":"Returns the yield rate"},"startDate()":{"notice":"Returns the start date of the yield schedule"},"timeUntilNextPeriod()":{"notice":"Returns time until next period starts in seconds"},"token()":{"notice":"Returns the token this schedule is for"},"topUpUnderlyingAsset(uint256)":{"notice":"Allows topping up the contract with underlying assets for yield payments"},"totalUnclaimedYield()":{"notice":"Calculates the total unclaimed yield across all holders"},"totalYieldForNextPeriod()":{"notice":"Calculates the total yield that will be needed for the next period"},"underlyingAsset()":{"notice":"Returns the underlying asset used for yield payments"},"unpause()":{"notice":"Unpauses the contract"},"withdrawAllUnderlyingAsset(address)":{"notice":"Withdraws all underlying assets"},"withdrawUnderlyingAsset(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraws underlying assets"}},"notice":"This contract implements a fixed yield schedule for ERC20 tokens, allowing for periodic yield distributions based on token balances. It supports features like historical balance tracking, period-based distributions, and pro-rated yield returns._0: Array of timestamps when each period ends

params.holder: The address to calculate yield for

claimYield().details: Calculates and transfers all unclaimed yield for completed periods

params.endDate_: The timestamp when the schedule ends
params.initialOwner: The address that will receive admin rights
params.interval_: The interval between distributions in seconds
params.rate_: The yield rate in basis points (1 basis point = 0.01%, e.g., 500 = 5%)
params.startDate_: The timestamp when the schedule starts
params.tokenAddress: The address of the token this schedule is for

returns._0: The current period number (0 if schedule hasn't started)
The timestamp when the schedule ends

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

returns._0: The interval between distributions in seconds

isTrustedForwarder(address).details: Indicates whether any particular address is the trusted forwarder.

returns._0: The last period number claimed by the caller
The last period number claimed by the holder
The last completed period number (0 if no periods completed)

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

returns._0: The timestamp when the period ends
The yield rate in basis points (1 basis point = 0.01%)

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

returns._0: The timestamp when the schedule starts

params.amount: The amount of underlying assets to add

totalUnclaimedYield().details: This includes all completed periods that haven't been claimed yet

returns._0: The total amount of unclaimed yield

totalYieldForNextPeriod().details: This is useful for ensuring sufficient funds are available for the next distribution

returns._0: The total amount of yield needed for the next period

trustedForwarder().details: Returns the address of the trusted forwarder.

params.to: The address to send the underlying assets to

params.amount: The amount of underlying assets to withdraw
params.to: The address to send the underlying assets to

RATE_BASIS_POINTS().notice: The basis points denominator used for rate calculations (10,000 = 100%)

allPeriods().notice: Returns all period end timestamps for this yield schedule

calculateAccruedYield().notice: Calculates the total accrued yield for the caller including pro-rated current period

calculateAccruedYield(address).notice: Calculates the total accrued yield including pro-rated current period

claimYield().notice: Claims all available yield for the caller

currentPeriod().notice: Returns the current ongoing period number

endDate().notice: Returns the end date of the yield schedule

lastClaimedPeriod().notice: Returns the last claimed period for the caller

lastClaimedPeriod(address).notice: Returns the last claimed period for a holder

lastCompletedPeriod().notice: Returns the last completed period number that can be claimed

periodEnd(uint256).notice: Returns the period end timestamp for a specific period

startDate().notice: Returns the start date of the yield schedule

timeUntilNextPeriod().notice: Returns time until next period starts in seconds

token().notice: Returns the token this schedule is for

topUpUnderlyingAsset(uint256).notice: Allows topping up the contract with underlying assets for yield payments

totalUnclaimedYield().notice: Calculates the total unclaimed yield across all holders

totalYieldForNextPeriod().notice: Calculates the total yield that will be needed for the next period

underlyingAsset().notice: Returns the underlying asset used for yield payments
